attributes.action: Bring in Patients' Rights in Statute
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Statutory obligation to:
*Report all medical accidents that harm patients
*Give full disclosure of harm to patient
*Ensure genuine remedial care
*Investigate cause of harm including patient's perspective.
*Offer financial Redress against a National Tariff + mediation
*Immediate copies of medical records + scans, X-rays etc. checked by patient to prevent propagation of inaccurate information.
*Written permission from patient before transfer of information onto Patient Electronic Medical Data Base.
"Sufferers of Iatrogenic Neglect"
Gillian M Bean & Margaret MacRae (Co-Directors & Founder Members)
